content: The armor can also be upgraded, with Fine Gold Thread and Celestial Ribbon once you reach Chen Loong and open the Zodiac Realm in The New West in Chapter 3.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Iron_Set.md', within the main section titled 'Iron Set'.
The content is as follows:
The armor can also be upgraded, with Fine Gold Thread and Celestial Ribbon once you reach Chen Loong and open the Zodiac Realm in The New West in Chapter 3.
